actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to amend section 203 of the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to require, prior to disposal, that notice and first right of refusal be given to certain previous owners of surplus real property.

summary.text: Amends the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to require Federal agencies which are about to dispose of surplus real property to first offer such property for sale to the person or entity from which such property was acquired by the Federal Government.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 203 of the Federal Property and Administrative Services Act of 1949 to require, prior to disposal, that notice and first right of refusal be given to certain previous owners of surplus real property.
